title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The game item depicted is a beautiful white flower, symbolizing purity and renewal. With its delicate petals and vibrant yellow center, it stands out against a dark background, inviting players to explore its significance. Often associated with healing and growth in various gaming contexts, this flower can be used as a crafting material, ingredient for potions, or a quest item. Its aesthetic appeal adds charm to the game environment, hinting at the presence of life and nature within the world. Players may find it essential for enhancing abilities, unlocking new areas, or completing tasks, making it a valuable collectible.
